properties.displayName: Table Storage should use customer-managed key for encryption
properties.description: Secure your table storage with greater flexibility using customer-managed keys. When you specify a customer-managed key, that key is used to protect and control access to the key that encrypts your data. Using customer-managed keys provides additional capabilities to control rotation of the key encryption key or cryptographically erase data.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
